solution_line_template: There will be {num_kids} kids playing soccer and {bars_per_kid} granola bars for each kid, {num_kids} x {bars_per_kid} = <<{num_kids}*{bars_per_kid}={total_bars_needed}>>{total_bars_needed} granola bars total.

Each box of granola bars has {bars_per_box} in it, so Katie's mother needs {total_bars_needed} granola bars / {bars_per_box} bars each box = <<{total_bars_needed}/{bars_per_box}={num_boxes}>>{num_boxes} boxes.
